what: 'Dynamic Soils Hub' Soil Property Grids — dsh_soil_properties
title: 'Dynamic Soils Hub' Soil Property Grids — dsh_soil_properties
text: Create 'terra' SpatRaster object referencing soil property grids 'Dynamic Soils Hub' Public S3 bucket

title: 'Dynamic Soils Hub' Soil Property Grids — dsh_soil_properties
code: dsh_soil_properties(   x = NULL,   variables = NULL,   resolutions = NULL,   aggregations = NULL,   top_depth = 0,   bottom_depth = 200,   locations = "conus",   territories = "conus",   filename = NULL,   overwrite = FALSE,   vrt = FALSE,   ... )

title: 'Dynamic Soils Hub' Soil Property Grids — dsh_soil_properties
text: x R spatial object (SpatVector, SpatRaster, sf object). Default: NULL returns virtual raster. x SpatRaster coordinate reference system, extent, resolution used template output raster. variables character. One variables corresponding grid file names (without .tif extension). See https://s3-fpac-nrcs-dshub-public.s3.us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/SoilProperties/_README.txt details. resolutions integer. One : 30, 900. Use NULL filter resolution. aggregations character. One : "domcond", "wtdavg", "minmax". Use NULL filter aggregation method. top_depth integer. Top depth. Default: 0 (includes grids depth) bottom_depth integer. Bottom depth. Default: 200 locations character. One : "conus", "oconus". Use NULL filter location. territories character. One : "conus", "pr", "ak", "", "fm", "gu", "hi", "mh", "mp", "pw" filename character. Path write output raster file. Default: NULL keep result memory (store temporary file memory threshold exceeded) overwrite logical. Overwrite filename exists? Default: FALSE vrt logical. Use terra::vrt() result SpatRaster? Default: FALSE ... Additional arguments passed writeRaster() via terra::crop() terra::project(). Ignored x NULL.

title: 'Dynamic Soils Hub' Soil Property Grids — dsh_soil_properties

code: if (FALSE) { # requireNamespace("terra") && as.logical(Sys.getenv("R_RDSHUB_RUN_LONG_EXAMPLES", unset = "FALSE")) library(rdshub) library(terra)  x <- dsh_soil_properties(   # variables = c("claytotal", "sandtotal", "silttotal", "drainagecl"),   top_depth = 0,   bottom_depth = c(0, 200),   aggregations = c("wtdavg", "domcond"),   resolutions = 900 )  terra::sources(x)  terra::metags(x, layer = 1)  vars <- x |>   terra::metags(seq_len(terra::nlyr(x))) |>   subset(name == "variable") names(x) <- vars$value  terra::plot(x)  terra::plot(x$sandtotal + x$claytotal + x$silttotal)  y <- dsh_soil_properties(variables = "mukey",                          aggregation = "domcond",                          bottom_depth = 0) y terra::plot(y[2]) }
